DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the clinical sensitivity and specificity of the FilmArray Global Fever (GF) Panel.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation of the FilmArrayÂ® Global Fever (GF) Panel
DOC.criteria: Whole blood in EDTA (prospectively collected via informed consent) Subject has a recorded or selfreported fever within the past two days. Subject has not previously been enrolled in this study.
